name: HoosierSound-OffIUSportsNewsbyHoosierSound
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Hoosier Sound-Off is a regular news update of the most important Indiana sports news from The Hoosier Sound. Hosted by Noah Freeman, this short flash briefing will include short updates from around the Indiana University athletic department for a variety of sports.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
